name: Santana
description:
Santana is a western Run 'n Gun video game.

León Veracruz, a young gunslinger and his horse Santana need to get back to their hometown in Nuevo Mexico but they will find many obstacles in their journey.

Your journey across deserts, canyons and mountains is harsh and you will find surprises along the way, be brave!

CONTROLS:

A, D: move León sideways

W, S: point your gun up or down

SPACEBAR: jump

MOUSE LEFT: shoot your current gun

MOUSE RIGHT: throw a dynamite stick
